meaningMnemonic: Not to be confused with 跳ぶ, this word has the same meaning. The reading is different, however.
readingMnemonic: The reading for this one is は because you're laughing (<reading>HAHAHA!</reading>!) at the person who put <reading>Nair</reading> (ねる) on their legs, then only finding it to be really painful, so they have <vocabulary>to jump</vocabulary> around to get the pain to go away.
